meanings.definition: The outer layer of a pollen grain.
meanings.sent1: The ektexine protects the pollen grain.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the ektexine to understand pollen structure.
meanings.sent3: The ektexine of the pollen grain was so strong, it could withstand extreme temperatures.
meanings.sent4: The ektexine acted like a shield, guarding the delicate pollen inside.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the ektexine appeared as a sturdy fortress around the pollen grain.

meanings.definition: A tough, resistant layer surrounding a spore.
meanings.sent1: The ektexine of the spore provides protection.
meanings.sent2: The ektexine layer shields the spore from harm.
meanings.sent3: The ektexine on the spore seemed to have a superhero-like strength.
meanings.sent4: The ektexine functioned as an impenetrable barrier for the spore.
meanings.sent5: Even under pressure, the ektexine remained unyielding around the spore.
